edited_stories.edited_story_text: Yesterday I picked my new bike up from the shop and I love it! I took it out for a test ride and took some photos of it along the way. As you can see it's a 16th anniversary model and the "LifeCycle" company was around from 1972-1982. The gears and chains are very retro.
